Test Name: Dilute Russell's Viper Venom Time (DRVVT) Mix
Purpose: To detect lupus anticoagulants by measuring the clotting time of a 1:1 mix of patient and normal pooled plasma using the DRVVT assay.
Equipment: Automated coagulation analyzer or manual coagulation equipment with DRVVT reagents, incubation equipment, calibrated pipettes, timer
